meta.description: Character Portrait Templates - 22 variations per character

front_view.name: Front View Portrait
front_view.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, {color_detail}, front view facing camera, symmetrical composition, standing upright robot mode, neutral pleasant expression, {features}, {style}, clean studio background with soft gradient, even soft lighting, 3d animated robot aircraft, exactly two {eye_color} eyes, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
front_view.notes: Primary identification portrait, must be perfectly symmetrical

three_quarter_view.name: Three-Quarter View
three_quarter_view.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, three-quarter angle view, 45-degree angle showing front and side, {color_detail}, {features}, friendly welcoming expression, {style}, dynamic yet stable pose, clean background, three-point lighting, exactly two {eye_color} eyes, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
three_quarter_view.notes: Classic portrait angle for character cards

side_profile.name: Side Profile
side_profile.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, side profile view, 90-degree side angle, {color_detail}, {features}, {style}, showing full silhouette, clean background, profile lighting, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

back_view.name: Back View
back_view.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, back view from behind, showing back details, {color_detail}, {features}, robot mode standing, wings and back details visible, {style}, clean studio background, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
back_view.notes: Shows back details and wing configuration

portrait_closeup.name: Face Closeup
portrait_closeup.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, close-up portrait of face and upper body, {color_detail}, {features}, expressive friendly face, {style}, exactly two large {eye_color} eyes, detailed face features, soft studio lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}
portrait_closeup.notes: Focus on facial expression and details

extreme_closeup.name: Extreme Face Closeup
extreme_closeup.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, extreme close-up of face only, filling frame, {color_detail}, {features}, highly detailed face, expressive {eye_color} eyes with reflections, facial details clearly visible, {style}, dramatic portrait lighting, {base_style}, {quality}
extreme_closeup.notes: Maximum detail face shot for dialogue scenes

low_angle_view.name: Low Angle Heroic
low_angle_view.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, dramatic low angle view from below, looking up at character, heroic imposing perspective, {color_detail}, {features}, powerful confident pose, {style}, dramatic sky background, epic heroic lighting, {base_style}, {quality}

high_angle_view.name: High Angle View
high_angle_view.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, high angle view from above, looking down at character, bird's eye perspective, {color_detail}, {features}, looking up at camera, cute endearing pose, {style}, clean floor background, overhead lighting, {base_style}, {quality}

flying_pose.name: Flying Pose
flying_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, vehicle mode airplane flying, {color_detail}, {features}, dynamic flying pose, wings fully spread, soaring through blue sky with white fluffy clouds, slight motion blur effect, {style}, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
flying_pose.notes: Vehicle mode in flight - important for mission animations

standing_pose.name: Standing Pose
standing_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode standing pose, full body view from head to feet, {color_detail}, {features}, confident standing posture, arms slightly raised in friendly gesture, {style}, exactly two {eye_color} eyes, clean studio background, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
standing_pose.notes: Full body robot mode for hangar screen

action_pose.name: Dynamic Action Pose
action_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode dynamic action pose, mid-motion dramatic stance, {color_detail}, {features}, energetic movement, arms extended in action, one leg forward dynamic balance, {style}, motion blur effects, action lines, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

heroic_pose.name: Heroic Power Pose
heroic_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode heroic power pose, hands on hips confident stance, chest out proud posture, {color_detail}, {features}, determined heroic expression, cape-like wing effect, {style}, dramatic backlight, lens flare, {base_style}, {quality}

transformation.name: Transformation Pose
transformation.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, mid-transformation pose, between vehicle and robot mode, {color_detail}, {features}, transforming sequence, wings folding into backpack, arms deploying from sides, legs extending, {style}, dynamic transformation energy, glowing accents, {base_style}, {quality}

waving_gesture.name: Waving Hello
waving_gesture.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode waving gesture, one arm raised high waving hello, {color_detail}, {features}, super friendly warm smile, welcoming expression, {style}, bright cheerful lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}

thumbs_up.name: Thumbs Up
thumbs_up.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode giving thumbs up, one hand showing big thumbs up gesture, {color_detail}, {features}, encouraging confident smile, positive affirmation pose, {style}, bright optimistic lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}

pointing.name: Pointing Forward
pointing.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode pointing forward, one arm extended pointing at viewer, {color_detail}, {features}, determined motivated expression, call to action pose, {style}, dynamic lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}

salute_pose.name: Salute
salute_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode military salute pose, one hand raised to forehead in salute, {color_detail}, {features}, respectful proud expression, standing at attention, {style}, formal dignified lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}

victory_pose.name: Victory Celebration
victory_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode victory pose, both arms raised in triumph, fists pumped in celebration, {color_detail}, {features}, ecstatic joyful expression, jumping celebratory stance, {style}, confetti and sparkles around, celebratory lighting, {base_style}, {quality}

ready_stance.name: Ready Stance
ready_stance.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode ready action stance, slight crouch ready to move, arms positioned for action, {color_detail}, {features}, alert focused expression, anticipation pose, {style}, dynamic tension lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}

thinking_pose.name: Thinking Pose
thinking_pose.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode thinking pose, one hand on chin thoughtfully, {color_detail}, {features}, contemplative curious expression, head tilted slightly, {style}, soft intellectual lighting, clean background, {base_style}, {quality}

icon.name: Icon (512x512)
icon.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, icon portrait, centered face closeup, {color_detail}, {features}, {style}, exactly two {eye_color} eyes, simple clean solid color background, high contrast, clear silhouette, icon design suitable for UI, {base_style}, {quality}
icon.notes: For UI icons, character selection thumbnails

mini_icon.name: Mini Icon (256x256)
mini_icon.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, tiny icon portrait, simple face only, {color_detail}, {features}, {style}, minimalist design, solid color background, very high contrast, clear readable at small size, {base_style}, {quality}
